attributes.action: All parking  meters/ticket machines to issue tickets in proportion to the money paid in lieu of providing change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many times have you visited a ticket machine and found it requires an awkward amount for the time you want and doesnt issue change. The result is that you overpay and do not receive any parking credit for the overpayment?

There is no valid reason why the machine cannot credit extra parking based on the fee paid up to the maximum parking permitted.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
